title: All Revved Up With No Place to Go

chunks.lyrics: The timing may be off in some places but for the most part it is ok.
Well I was nothing... boy... new...
I was a varsity tackle ran a hell of a block
when I play my guitar rock but
Every Saturday night, I felt the fever grow
Do ya know what it?s like?
All revved up with no place to go.
I?m a hunter in the dark... I?ve been
Cruising... main drag all night long.
Someones got to draw first blood.
Oh I got to draw first blood.
Oh I got to draw first blood.
Sax Solo. Play this under the solo
All revved up with no place to go!
All revved up with no place to go!
I?m currently working on the rest of the album. To quote Axl Rose,
?soon isn?t the word,? but it is on its way.
